resources.string: Ashoka Arts and HandiCrafts resides in the beautiful "City of Lakes" Udaipur Rajasthan,famous for its beautiful Lakes,Gardens,Heritage Hotels.Ashoka Arts is the Udaipur\'s leading Handicrafts Merchants.The Merchants manifacture artwork and various handicrafts products.Their manifacturing jems include famous "Rajasthani Paintings",Wooden and Metal Artworks, Rajasthani Bandhage style Cushion coves,wall hangings and many more
339, \'Ashoka Arts and Art School \', Gangaur Ghat Marg, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
